Title: Tidy DotNetNuke Theme
Description: Tidy is a responsive DotNetNuke theme originally created by Adam Humphrey for DotNetNuke World 2012 training.
HomeWiki:
Project Description

Tidy is a responsive DotNetNuke theme originally created by Adam Humphrey for DotNetNuke World 2012 training.

Demo

See Tidy in action at http://tidy.byadammer.com

Features

  • Responsive
  • HTML5, CSS3, jQuery
  • Social Page Styles
  • Right-To-Left page style (Beta) for http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Right-to-left languages

Dependencies

  • DotNetNuke 6 or later
  • DotNetNuke 7 optimized

Installation

This theme can only be installed as a HOST (installation) skin, not as an ADMIN (site) skin. Meaning you can only install it from the Host Extensions page, not the Admin Extensions page. It can be used on any website in a DotNetNuke Installation.
